page.title: 02COASTAL PATH - BIOLOGY
page.content: A survey of the biology of the coastal path between the Southern edge of the block and Polurrian Cove was undertaken in July.It was obvious that seeds of cultivated plants had escaped from gardens and plants became established along the coastal path. North of Polurrian Cove and South of the next cove to the North,Poldhu, the path is bounded on the landward side by a stone wall and this offers another niche for coastal plants to colonise besides the cliff tops. {A list of plants and animals {identified along the path is shown on {the next page. }
